name: Through The Ages (itch) (Arridian)
description:
A game made for the "My First Game Jam"

You travel through time, starting at the earliest beginnings and ending with the incredibly popular iPhone games of the modern era. The five eras are: Ascii, 8Bit, 16bit (Mario), 16bit (Sonic/Streetfighter), RPG/PS1 style, and finally modern.

This project was truly a group effort, and I was honored to be able to work with these talented artists.

Thanks so much to all of you guys!

Music by Metatron.

Mario style art by Donavin Draws

Sonic style art by VeMoose

RPG style by quineapig(I know the jump animation is broken, I'm working on that still)

Modern style by gameart2d

If you find any problems please tell me down below! And thank you for playing my game!
